solution_line_template: Shem earns ${kem_hourly_wage} x {shem_wage_multiplier} = $<<{kem_hourly_wage}*{shem_wage_multiplier}={shem_hourly_wage}>>{shem_hourly_wage} in an hour.
So, Shem earns ${shem_hourly_wage} x {workday_hours} = $<<{shem_hourly_wage}*{workday_hours}={shem_daily_wage}>>{shem_daily_wage} for an {workday_hours}-hour workday.
